archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Horse Racing Papers of Marion duPont Scott
1908-1977
did.physdesc: This collection contains 8 volumes and ca. 30 items (1 Hollinger box).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Horse racing papers of Marion duPont Scott, 1908-1977, Accession #11092-d, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: These papers form part of the bequest of Marion duPont Scott to the University of Virginia Library and were transferred from the Rare Books Division to the Manuscripts Division on May 6, 1998.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection pertains to the breeding and purchase of thoroughbred horses, a horse show, a dog show, and to the records of early jockey clubs in Tappanhannock, Richmond, and Norfolk, and stud books of nineteenth century horse breeders, H.A. Tayloe of Mount Airy and George H. Burwell of Carter Hall. Types of materials include bound volumes, letters, photographs, pedigrees, a dog show ribbon, promotional photographs showing the portraits of Alfred Jonniaux, and breeding records.

did.unittitle:
"Ardent Dancer" Pedigree & Letters re: Sale, with black & white photograph
1962-1965
Best of Breed Ribbon from "Harrisburg Kennel Club, March 19, 1977," a memoranda book and a list of issues of Country Life1963, 1977, n.d.

Examples of the Work of Portrait Painter, Alfred Jonniaux
1949-1951
Pedigrees & Photographs of Irish Fillies for Sale in Dublin ca. 1976
Photographs of Horses and a Dog by Raymond G. Woolfe, Bert & Richard Morgan Studio, William P. Gilbert and Peter A. Juley & Son n.d.

Bound volume containing handwritten copy of the Newmarket Calendar of the stake races reported in C.M. Prior's Manuscript
1718-1751

Bound volume containing a photostatic copy of the Tappahannock Jockey Club Minute Book, with some fragmentary accounts for 1796-1797, original at the Virginia Historical Society, Tayloe Papers
1796-1801

Bound volume containing photostatic copies of 1) Stud Book of George H. Burwell (1799-1873) of Carter Hall, 1823-1828; 2) William Thornton letters to George H. Burwell, 1824-1833; 3) John Randolph of Roanoke horse letters, 1802-1805, 1828; and 4) William B. Johnson to Richard Singleton, 1833
1802-1833

Bound volume containing a transcript of the Minute Book of the Richmond Jockey Club
1824-1835

Bound volume containing a transcript of the Minute Book of the Norfolk Jockey Club
1826-1833

Bound volume containing photostatic copy of the Stud Book of H.A. Tayloe, Mount Airy
1835-1840

Bound volume containing a photostatic copy of the Minute Book of the Norfolk Jockey Club
1826-1833
